page.title: 12Marbles
page.content: Sometimes we play {Marbles,}these are little glass balls with different colours in them. You can get Dobbers which are big marbles, King Dobbers which are very big, Ordinaries which are quite small and quite a few others. This is how you play: You need a marble and a friend with the same sort of marble. You tap marbles with your friend and say,"Once once keepsies, only rolls in the game", (this means that you can only roll the marbles not bomb them). You roll your marble and the other person has to roll theirs and try to hit it; you take turns to roll the marbles and whoever hits the opponent's marble keeps both marbles. If you only want to practise, you say,"Once once practices, only rolls in the game". But then you don't have to play it at all!
